info.title: ConfidentialLedgerClient
info.description: The ConfidentialLedgerClient writes and retrieves ledger entries against the Confidential Ledger service.

ConfidentialLedgerError.description: An error response from Confidential Ledger.

ConfidentialLedgerErrorBody.description: An error response from Confidential Ledger.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
